title: TFT Bots
body:
Why are their so many bot users playing tft....
Every single game weather it be ranked or just a norms duo sometimes trio and seem that we're the only users that above level 1
I'd like to sit here and believe that they are just normal players that have downloaded the game to play tft mobile but every single game/ranked you need to at least change ranked or something
Cause why do you have restrictions on draft/ranked/flex if you can just enter ranked as a lv 1 on tft??
